General.Name: Qian Jiang Water Resources Development Co Ltd
General.Description: Qian Jiang Water Resources Development Co.,Ltd, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the water supply business in China. The company is also involved in the treatment of sewage and sludge. Qian Jiang Water Resources Development Co.,Ltd was founded in 1998 and is headquartered in Hangzhou, China.
General.Address: No. 3 Santai Mountain Road, Hangzhou, China, 310013
